comments:
Starting with the v20071023 integration build, the jst.ws.tests.unittest.AllWSJunitTest had been failing for:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at org.eclipse.jst.ws.tests.unittest.BUJavaAxisTC50.verifyOutput(BUJavaAxisTC50.java:151)
at org.eclipse.jst.ws.tests.unittest.BUJavaAxisTC50.testBUJavaAxisTC50(BUJavaAxisTC50.java:124)

and 

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at org.eclipse.jst.ws.tests.unittest.TDJavaAxisTC50.verifyOutput(TDJavaAxisTC50.java:137)
at org.eclipse.jst.ws.tests.unittest.TDJavaAxisTC50.testTDJavaAxisTC50(TDJavaAxisTC50.java:110)


The error log indicated:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.server.core 4 0 2007-10-29 10:51:56.658
!MESSAGE Task failed
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Publishing failed with multiple errors
		 at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.PublishOperation2.throwException(PublishOperation2.java:159)

		 at org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.ui.command.StartServerCommand$1.run(StartServerCommand.java:132)

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core 4 0 2007-10-29 10:51:56.664
As sugggested, I've moved the ServerCreateTests to be run after the other tests in ALlWSJUnitTests and released to WTP 3.0 I build.

Moving the order of the test did not make a difference.  The JUnits are still failing.  I've removed the BU and TD tests for now and released the change to HEAD as v200710312004.

Seng, please continue the investigation of why the tests are failing.  We could also change the test to just do DEVELOP rather than going all the way to START.
Similar problem is now showing up with the ClientAxisTC50 JUnit.  I've commented out that test for now as well.  Seng, please take a look to see what could be causing these problems.

Created an attachment (id=83126)
jst.ws.tests fix - re-enables the BU,TD,Client Axis tests without starting servers

The agreed upon fix is to disable publishing of the project to the server, and just exercise the Web services tooling part for each scenario.

The patch re-enables the three Web services scenarios; Java creation, WSDL creation, and WSDL consumption.
Patch committed to R2_0_maintenance and HEAD.  Released to R2_0_maintenance as v200711261941 and to HEAD as v200711261948.
